title: Never ending loading screen
body: I'm currently running league on a Mac, and I'm having a problem with the new client where I click the league icon but it will never actually load in. Then when I click on the icon again the client is shown just as a white box in the top left corner. I then have to physically unplug my computer to shut out of league. I tried reinstalling it but to no luck.

replies.body: It sounds like you might be having a connection problem that's getting stuck.  Try out the steps in our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to troubleshoot this.  Make sure to select the Mac box for instructions specific to your case.  Let me know if you have any questions!
